clearable.description: Whether to enable the clear icon, the input box will be cleared after clicking the clear icon
clearable.description_zh: 是否启用清除图标，点击清除图标后将清除输入框

disabled.description: Whether it is disabled or not

id.description: The id of the input element, usually used with label
id.description_zh: 输入元素的 id，通常与 label 一起使用

max.description: Maximum value, only valid when type is number
max.description_zh: 最大值，仅当类型为数字时才有效

min.description: Minimum value, only valid when type is number
min.description_zh: 最小值，仅当类型为数字时才有效

readOnly.description: Whether it is readonly or not

events.name: onChange
events.description: Triggered when the input content is changed

events.name: onClear
events.description: Triggered after clicking the clear button

events.name: onEnterPress
events.description: The callback when Enter key is pressed

events.name: onlyShowClearWhenFocus
events.description: If true, the clear button will only be displayed when the input box is focused. If false, the clear button will still be displayed after the input box loses focus.
events.description_zh: 如果为 true，则仅在输入框聚焦时才会显示清除按钮。如果为 false，则在输入框失去焦点后仍将显示清除按钮。

methods.name: blur
methods.description: Let the input box lose focus

methods.name: focus
methods.description: Let the input box get focus
